description: Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos announces surprise $10B pledge to fight climate change go.com
content:
Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos announced via Instagram that he is donating $10 billion to fight "the devastating impact of climate change on this planet we all share."
Bezos, whose net worth is reported to be more than $129 billion, said the $10 billion commitment wi… [+1660 chars]

author: Bill Hutchinson
title: Shooting victim alleges hospital missed bullet in her head and sent her home
description: Shakena Jefferson was hit by a stray bullet in front of her home.
content: A Miami woman initially counted herself blessed for having survived a drive-by shooting with what she alleges a doctor told her was just a graze wound. But days later Shakena Jefferson was rushed to a trauma center where an X-ray confirmed she had been walkin… [+3862 chars]
